insert into room_type_pictures_info (id, room_type_id, url, type, creator_id, create_time, modified_id, modified_time, is_visible, is_deleted) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roomTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifiedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.isVisible,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.delete: update room_type_pictures_info set is_deleted = 1, modified_id='SYSTEM', modified_time=now() where room_type_id = #{roomTypeId}
